query.sfwSql:
SELECT PA.*, CVOPTION.DESCRIPTION as BENEFIT_OPTION, CVRELATION.DESCRIPTION AS ACCOUNT_RELATIONSHIP,PER.MPI_PERSON_ID, CASE WHEN PER.MPI_PERSON_ID IS NOT NULL then ISNULL(LAST_NAME,'')+' '+ISNULL(FIRST_NAME,'') END AS PAYEE_NAME, CVBENEFITTYPE.DESCRIPTION AS BENEFIT_TYPE, CVRETIREMENTTYPE.DESCRIPTION AS RETIREMENT_TYPE, SBA.RETIREMENT_DATE , CVFUNDTYPE.DESCRIPTION AS FUND_TYPE, 0.0 as IAP_HOURS
FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PA (NOLOCK)
INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS(NOLOCK) ON PAS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR PBXR WITH(NOLOCK) ON PBXR.PLAN_BENEFIT_ID=PA.PLAN_BENEFIT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PLAN SPLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPLN.PLAN_ID = PBXR.PLAN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER(NOLOCK) ON PA.PERSON_ID = PER.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL SBAD(NOLOCK) ON SBAD.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL_ID = PA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION SBA(NOLOCK) ON SBA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID = SBAD.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION_DETAIL SBCD WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBCD.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_DETAIL_ID = PA.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_DETAIL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION_HEADER SBCH ON SBCH.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_HEADER_ID = SBCD.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_HEADER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_QDRO_CALCULATION_DETAIL SQCD WITH(NOLOCK) ON SQCD.QDRO_CALCULATION_DETAIL_ID = PA.DRO_CALCULATION_DETAIL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_QDRO_CALCULATION_HEADER SQCH ON SQCH.QDRO_CALCULATION_HEADER_ID = SQCD.QDRO_CALCULATION_HEADER_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CVOPTION (nolock) ON PBXR.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID = CVOPTION.CODE_ID AND PBXR.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE = CVOPTION.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CVRELATION (nolock) ON PA.ACCOUNT_RELATION_ID= CVRELATION.CODE_ID AND PA.ACCOUNT_RELATION_VALUE = CVRELATION.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CVBENEFITTYPE (nolock) ON PA.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_ID= CVBENEFITTYPE.CODE_ID AND PA.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE = CVBENEFITTYPE.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CVRETIREMENTTYPE (nolock) ON PA.RETIREMENT_TYPE_ID= CVRETIREMENTTYPE.CODE_ID AND PA.RETIREMENT_TYPE_VALUE = CVRETIREMENTTYPE.CODE_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT SPBA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPBA.PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CVFUNDTYPE (nolock) ON SPBA.FUNDS_TYPE_ID= CVFUNDTYPE.CODE_ID AND SPBA.FUNDS_TYPE_VALUE = CVFUNDTYPE.CODE_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT A.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID FROM SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PAYMENT_SCHEDULE B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID = B.PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID WHERE A.PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID = B.PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID ) PREVPHH ON PREVPHH.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = @PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID
